original_title: Bi urte, lau hilabete eta egun bat
overview: The documentary tells the story of six friends who fought against compulsory military service in the Basque Country. They were all imprisoned for refusing to perform military service, and they all preferred prison to the army. They showed great courage and stubbornness, until they managed to win the antimilitarist struggle against the Spanish State.
title: Two Years, Four Months and One Day
